snippet: Mr. Bayley was an Oxford don and literary critic who found an international readership with his memoir “Elegy for Iris,” a moving account of his life with the novelist Iris Murdoch, his wife.
abstract: John Bayley, Oxford don and literary critic who wrote widely read memoir about his life with Iris Murdoch, dies at age 89.

byline.contributor: Sam Roberts and Jack Kadden contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Mr. Bayley was an Oxford don and literary critic who found an international readership with his memoir “Elegy for Iris,” a moving account of his life with the novelist Iris Murdoch, his wife.

headline.main: John Bayley, Oxford Don Who Wrote of His Wife, Iris Murdoch, Dies at 89
headline.print_headline: John Bayley, Oxford Don Who Wrote of His Wife, Iris Murdoch, Dies at 89
